bug.author: ryanwongsa
bug.summary: NeptuneSaver saves more checkpoints than specified by the n_saved parameter
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸ› Bug description</denchmark-h>
The recent change to Checkpointing in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/pull/937>#937</denchmark-link> seemed to have affected the NeptuneSaver in that it saves more than the specified checkpoints. It is probably because it doesn't have the the interface. Maybe because of this change <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vfdev-5/ignite/blob/f5d00c9887888fa31059ca4cc7a5e744889ce49f/ignite/handlers/checkpoint.py#L249>checkpoint.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.4): 1.4 Ignite Version (e.g., 0.3.0): nightly OS (e.g., Linux): Linux How you installed Ignite (conda, pip, source): pip Python version: 3.7
